PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2001-10872001-06-120PWGS,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Public Works and Government Services of MICHEL BÉRUBÉ, of Charlesbourg, Quebec, as a director of the Board of Directors of Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective June 22, 2001, in the place of Claude Hallé, whose term has expired.
Attachments
